name: Trace Ace +
description:
No drawing skills required!

Trace Ace + is an incredibly simple & fun drawing game. It's easy to play - just remember the shapes and then trace them! Score higher based on how accurate your drawing is to the original shape. The shapes will combine to create amazing artworks!

Don't worry if you don't succeed, there's plenty of time to practice tracing!

Trace Ace + Features:

• You don't need to be an artist to have fun!

• Simple and satisfying drawing gameplay!

• A plethora of awesome shapes and pictures for you to trace!
